metadata.title: Blue Saint Instant Self-Tanner - Natural Self Tanning Lotion With Probiotics - Zero Orange Sunless Foam Self Tanner
features: Zero-Orange: Finally a self-tanner that doesn't leave the pumpkin orange tone afterwards.
All-Natural: Blue Saint is made from plant-based ingredients with italian probiotics that leaves a natural-looking tan.
Works Instantly: Starts to work immediately and the bronze tan deepens rapidly in just 2 hours.
Easy To Apply: Blue Saint is easy to apply, drys fast, and is streak-free!
No Fake Smell: Finally a self-tanner that that doesn't leave the typical fake-tan smell.
description: Blue Saint is a luxurious self-tanning foam that's made from plant-based ingredients with Italian probiotics for a natural-looking tan. It's easy to apply, streak-free, fast-drying, and has no “fake tan” smell. Blue Saint gives you beautiful instant color when applied, and your bronze tan deepens rapidly in just two hours.
